    RoadEnum - Enum Class in Traffic
    Enumeration representing all roads available in the system.
    RoundRobin - Class in Utils
    A simple round-robin turn coordinator for cooperating threads.
    RoundRobin(int) - Constructor for class Utils.RoundRobin
    Create a new RoundRobin coordinator.
    run() - Method in class Comunication.Receiver
    Main loop: accepts connections on the configured port, reads incoming vehicle events, forwards a corresponding arrival event to the EventHandler (updating the logical clock), and enqueues the received vehicle into the local queue.
    run() - Method in class Event.EventHandler
    Main thread loop: accepts connections on EventHandler.PORT, reads an Event object from the socket stream and inserts it into the event queue.
    run() - Method in class Traffic.PassRoad
    Main loop: polls for newly arrived vehicles, schedules their pass times and triggers processing when the scheduled time is reached.
    run() - Method in class Traffic.PedestrianLight
    Main loop: wait for the coordinator to grant the turn, hold the green interval, then release the turn.
    run() - Method in class Traffic.TrafficLight
    Main loop: wait for the round-robin turn, announce green, allow vehicles to pass during the green interval, announce red, then release the turn and repeat indefinitely.
    run() - Method in class Traffic.TrafficSorter
    Main loop: remove vehicles from the arrival queue, compute the incoming road based on the vehicle's path, and add the vehicle to the corresponding per-road queue.
